TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. It works slightly worse than the new SimCity game. That is, not at all.

I wish indie developers received more money for their work.

Granted, but then they all misplace/destroy their new money in a number of mostly unrelated freak accidents, except that all of the incidents involved mozzarella cheese and a secret organization set up by every other developer to crush the new indie games in a as of yet unknown plot.

I wish that I didn't need to blink.

granted your eyes grow dirty and you cant see

i wish for the next 7 hours to pass really fast

Granted. Unfortunately, it's because of extremely weird gravity, and you promptly die.

I wish for someone to tell me something tasty to eat.

granted they find it tasty you dont

i wish for 50 tonnes of solid gold that weighs as much as a penut

Granted. You die.

I wish for vodka.

Granted. The bulky russian man that you stole the vodka from is COMING FOR YOU! (read that in the TF2 heavy's voice.)

I wish for ultimate dance powers.

Granted. You have ultimate GANGNAM STYLE power.

I wish I had a pet Kerbal with rockets that worked for him to ride on.

Grsnted. You have Jeb and an SRB.

I wish POTKC actually corrupted my wish, not made it better.

Granted, the corruption comes true.

I wish I found out about the 0.20 update release earlier.

granted you impload due to happyness

I wish to have more time to play ksp

Granted, but it's thanks to a time loop.

I wish I were better at League of Legends.

Granted, but then Blizzard buys LoL and makes it a WoW minigame.

I wish that more people understand how orbital mechanics work.

Granted, everyone becomes better than you and you become depressed.

I wish to land on Lathye and plant a flag.

Granted. A glitch occurs and causes your kerbal to explode.

I wish for a shorter schoolday

Granted, it lasts for 1 second and so you fail at life as no one would employ you and your lack of skills

I wish to be able to use a seat as a command pod so it will have Kerbals on it if we have no command pods. Otherwise how do we ride SRBs?

Granted. However the SRBs keep exploding for no reason.

I wish PSY got killed by Jeb crashing a rocket into him.

Granted. Jeb dances OPPA GANGNAM STYLE.

I wish for 'Murica

Granted, 'Murica, a giant, hungry eagle, is teleported to you.

I wish that there was North Korean K-pop.

Granted. OPEN FIRE STYLE!

I wish to snipe more people.

Granted. You get arrested by the police after your second kill.

I wish for French people on this forum.

Granted, but they're intolerable and constantly jab at me for a couple of wars that have nothing to do with me

I wish for more YOU on this forum~<3

Granted, but then you get banned.

I wish for nothing.

Granted, the universe becomes nothing.

I wish for people to realise that putting star trek quotes in exams is the best.

Granted, the universe becomes nothing.

I wish for people to realise that putting star trek quotes in exams is the best.

Granted. Unfortanetely, there are people who fail horribly because they don't know any Star Trek quotes.

I wish that my interplanetary missions would work.
